name: Push The Box (itch) (Daddel)
description:
This is a small puzzle box pushing game where you're goal is to get killed lose all of your lives and die. This game was made for the Wowie game jam in 3 days by 1 person.

I used these free asset packs from unity:

Voxel Dungeon Environment Set 1 | 3D Dungeons | Unity Asset Store

Simple Button Set 01 | 2D Icons | Unity Asset Store
